sources.title: Song of the Birds (1935)
sources.description: Audrey is enjoying her air rifle, until she shoots down a baby bird and is filled with remorse until she sees it survived. The other birds, however, don't believe she's sincere about her reformation (even after she destroys the rifle), until the baby bird proves it. A remake of a March 1, 1935 Max Fleischer Color Classic of the same name. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-song-of-the-birds-1935/

metadata.Plot: A destructive little boy with an air rifle shoots a baby bird and is mortified when the bird's parents, and all the other birds, go into mourning.
metadata.Actors: Beatrice Hagen, Gertrude Lawrence, Ethelreda Leopold
